name: Ingress (itch)
description:
This game was made for the Brakeys Game Jam 2022.1 it is a 3d puzzle platformer in which you solve puzzles and platform across zones to reach the real gate. This is my first ever game jam and I think I'm going to have to pat myself on the back for completing and finishing this (even though its a little rough around the edges). 

After looking at the theme I mainly wanted to create something atmospheric and naturey feeling. The objective of the game is to go through the fake gates until you reach the real one. 

I decided to put my main focus on the graphics and game design. I really wished to make longer/more detailed levels but I was running out of time. Regardless, I really enjoyed  working on this short game/prototype and I might come back to it in the future to expand upon the ideas I have. I really hope you enjoy playing this as much I enjoyed making it :)

How to play

  • WASD to move/spacebar to jump/LeftShift key to sprint
  • When standing next to a Rune pillar press E to spawn a Purple cubes
  • When standing next to a Rune pillar press F to spawn a Purple cubes
  • Purple cubes are push able, simply walk infront of them to push.
